issue.title: [CF 1029] "Force top-row runes..." condition problem
issue.body:
Hello first,
i dont know if this is a problem or if it should work like this,but if you create a group of icons and you chose in this icons the condition "runes" with a check mark to "force top-runes to only match death runes." all the other icons, with the rune condtions in the same row also get the check mark.

For example:

I have 3 icons. In icon 1 and 2 i have a rune condition in line 1,3,5 and 6 and icon 3 in line 2,4,6. If i enable  the check mark in icon 1 at line 1,3 and 5 the check mark is also enabled in icon 2, in this lines, and 3 but in 3 its only set for line 6.(This problem also happens if the icons are in different groups and it doesn´t matter i which icon i enable the check mark,the other icons will get the check mark preference)

I made also a video of this so that you can see it in practice:
http://youtu.be/E2FKVu3fbd4

What it should do :
The check marks should be independent from other icons,so e.g. if i set check marks for them in icon 1 they shouldn´t show up in the other icons.

Here is my string with my example:

comments.body:
The problem is actually a lot simpler than all that - the setting was just never getting loaded. It gets saved when you click the checkbox, but it will never get loaded when you switch to a different icon.

Fixed in g7328f89.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
